thread.title: Japan lifts evacuation order for town near doomed nuke plant
thread.title_full: Japan lifts evacuation order for town near doomed nuke plant

title: Japan lifts evacuation order for town near doomed nuke plant
text: Japan lifts evacuation order for town near doomed nuke plant Saturday, 5 September 2015 (36 minutes ago) Japan's government on Saturday lifted a 4 1/2-year-old evacuation order for the northeastern town of Naraha that had sent all of the town's 7,400 residents away following the disaster at the nearby Fukushima nuclear plant. Japan's government on Saturday lifted a 4 1/2-year-old evacuation order for the northeastern town of Naraha that had sent all of the town's 7,400 residents away... TopNews 5 hours ago - Middle East THE Japanese government has officially lifted the 2011 evacuation order for the town of Naraha near the Fukushima nuclear plant.
